```{r}
TLFB <- read.csv("/Users/Ofix/Documents/Fac/internat/Recherche/projets/synchro/synchroData/INCANT/Data/CSV/psychometry/dataCannabis.csv")
```

With the graphs below, I chose : F1002+++, F1073+++, F1069++ and F1101++

I excluded F2010, F2013 since the configuration was too poor (overlapping subjects).

```{r}
str(TLFB)
```


```{r}
TLFB[1,c(3:7)]
v <- as.numeric(as.vector(TLFB[1,c(3:7)]))
v
plot(v, type="l", col=rainbow(nrow(TLFB))[1], main="Evolution of Cannabis Consumption for 32 subjects of the INCANT Study")
for (i in 2:nrow(TLFB)){
  print(i)
  v <- as.numeric(as.vector(TLFB[i,c(3:7)]))
  print(v)
  lines(v, type="l", col=rainbow(nrow(TLFB))[i])}
```


```{r}
plot <- FALSE
for (i in 1:length(TLFB$Case)){
  v <- as.numeric(as.vector(TLFB[i,c(25:29)]))
    print(paste (TLFB$Case[i], "below"))
    plot(v, type="l", col=rainbow(length(TLFB$Case))[i])}
```
